articles.author: Bridie Pearson-jones, Adam Shergold
articles.title: England Women's 20-0 thrashing of Latvia's part-time footballers was an 'unnecessary humiliation' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Lionesses are all full-time professional athletes, who play and club and international level, while Latvia's football team is made up mostly of teenagers who have other jobs alongside sport.
articles.content:
England Women's 20-0 thrashing of Latvia has opened up a debate about the fairness of international sport, with experts warning unfair games might be financially damaging to the sport.

articles.author: Homero De la Fuente, CNN
articles.title: Four golfers test positive ahead of South African Open - CNN
articles.description: Four golfers scheduled to play in the South African Open have been forced to withdraw after testing positive for Covid-19, the tournament announced on Thursday.
